abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Miltank by attacks from Fire Pokémon and Water Pokémon is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Healing Milk
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.
